pull.title: [0.18] Backport 15749: importmulti only imports origin info for PKH outputs
pull.body: Clean backport of #15749 by sipa to 0.18

events.body: @meshcollider These commits are missing the `Github-Pull:` and `Rebased-From:` info.
The backport should include the metadata. You may use a script to do it for you: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools#backport

events.message:
Keep full pubkeys in FlatSigningProvider::origins

Github-Pull: #15749
Rebased-From: 9a93c91c882265c908ea18496cd1bc271be914d4

Import all origin info in importmulti; even for non-importing pubkeys

Github-Pull: #15749
Rebased-From: 6e597001a4fc1ba837f3f23cfd7f2d65c3d58104

Take non-importing keys into account for spendability warning in descriptor import

Github-Pull: #15749
